message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more than my asking price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950,000. I'm confident this is a fair price that reflects the true value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, $950,000 is still a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering my budget constraints and the value I place on this product.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my initial offer already took into account a significant discount on the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. However, I need you to understand that this is my absolute bottom line.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. However, $900,000 is still slightly above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $875,000, which is my absolute maximum.  I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.
